messages.message: Hey team! Do we have any guides on how to run Jaegar/Grafana against a local dev sandbox on Crafting? cc @abhijnan maybe you would know?

I got the UI to load, but I'm getting this error when trying to search by trace ID:
```Unable to connect to trace backend. Please contact Instabase customer support with the following error: {\"data\":null,\"total\":0,\"limit\":0,\"offset\":0,\"errors\":[{\"code\":404,\"msg\":\"trace not found\"}]}\n```

This isn't something we support right now, however I think you'll need both Jaeger and Jaeger agent running for the spans to reach Jaeger. The span should go along something like `application -> agent(port: 6831) -> jaeger(port:14268)`
I see. How do we run Jaeger agent?
`make run-docker` in `third-party/docker/jaeger-agent`, it has a conflicting port (6831) with jaeger, removing this port in jaeger should work
Thank you! Iâ€™ll try it out tmr
